work_experience.responsibilities: Mobilized high volume of employees overseas on short and long term assignments; directed HR policies, benefits, payroll and employee relations; created assignment offers and compensation packages; managed HR functions across global regions; trained new employees; prepared and presented HR training seminars; managed benefits and administrative issues across multiple countries.

Handled unemployment and workersâ€™ compensation claims; maintained personnel files and affirmative action plan; conducted orientations; arranged medical appointments, travel, and housing for assignees; prepared personnel transfer paperwork; managed work visa applications for international regions.

Managed the Tax Equalization Program for expatriates and inpatriates; assisted employees with tax forms and reimbursements; processed invoices and check requests; maintained office supplies and financial documentation.

Provided administrative and secretarial support; managed employee assignments and payroll notifications; handled mail distribution and office organization; assisted with new project documentation and visa photos.

awards.name: MVP Award
awards.description: Recognized for meeting project client goal of mobilizations to Escravos GTL project.
